info.name: Better Modern Square Tabs for Firefox Australis
info.description: Classic tabs look with a modern touch, for newer versions of Firefox. Based on https://userstyles.org/styles/109282/modern-square-tabs-for-firefox-australis with some tiny modifications to background color to give a more Firefox appearance.
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.2
Better dark look to match Firefox scroll bar
Version 1.1
Made the look a little bit dark
Version 1.0
Initial release
